item.title: 🟦 danieladdisonorg/Hackathon-Winner-App (26 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: danieladdisonorg

📝 Repository: danieladdisonorg/Hackathon-Winner-App

📄 Descrizione: Hackathon Winner App, built with Next.js and TypeScript for a frontend, styled with Tailwind CSS. The Flask backend integrates Claude AI for generating location descriptions and ElevenLabs for text-to-speech conversion. Google Maps API enhances interactivity by displaying routes and POIs, while React hooks manage state

⭐ Stelle: 26

🍴 Forks: 4

💻 Linguaggio: TypeScript
